album.strDescriptionEN: Parallel Play is the ninth studio album by Canadian rock band Sloan, released on June 10, 2008. At the time of its release it was the band's shortest studio album; their previous album Never Hear the End of It was their longest album. The first single released from the album was "Believe in Me". The song "The Other Side" was featured on the popular American television series, Castle. The album was nominated for "Best Rock Album" at the 2009 Juno Awards.
